div.p: Hazlehurst City School District Is offering FREE grab & go lunches For anyone 18 and under Where: Hazlehurst Elementary/Middle School When: Monday – Friday Time: 11:00 am - 1:00 pm Children must be present in vehicle to receive a lunch. Drive-thru, walker, and bikers all welcome. Children…
